Package org.displaytag.export.excel

Class ExcelUtils

java.lang.Object
org.displaytag.export.excel.ExcelUtils
public class ExcelUtils extends Object
Convenience methods for the excel export. Contains code extracted from several existing classes.
Author:
andy Date: Nov 13, 2010 Time: 10:16:33 AM
